=Sublime Text Wiki=

This wiki is the home for packages (plugins) created for a really kick-ass and extensible editor, Sublime Text

[http://www.sublimetext.com Sublime Text] is a sophisticated text editor for code, html and prose. You'll love the slick user interface and extraordinary features.

[http://www.sublimetext.com/download Download it NOW!]
